sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { ImgWrap } from './contentElements' import{ ContentContainer, ContentWrapper, ContentRow, Column1, Column2, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, BtnWrap, BtnLink, Img} from './contentElements' const ContentSection = ({ lightBg, id, linkOne, imgStart, topLine, lightText, headline, darkText, description, img, alt, buttonLabel, primary, dark, dark2}) => { return ( <> {topLine} {headline} {description} {buttonLabel} ) } export default ContentSection
